name: smtp
description: Endpoint that will send notifications via arbitrary smtp server

parameters.description: Email address to send the mail to, multiple addresses seperated by ','

parameters.description: Email address to CC send the mail to, multiple addresses seperated by ','

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: The SMTP options like server, username, host etc.
